name: One Last Cup (Demo)
description:
Welcome to the first public demo of One Last Cup.

  • Keyboard to type
  • ENTER/SPACE to proceed
  • SHIFT to toggle previous text
  • UP/DOWN to navigate previous text
  • 0 to toggle audio
